program.name: Federal Child Tax Credit (CTC) / Credit for Other Dependents
program.description_short: Federal tax credit for families with children or other dependents
program.description:
Tax credits for families with children and other dependents. You may claim the federal Child Tax Credit for qualifying children. You may be able to claim the Credit for Other Dependents if your children do not qualify for the child tax credit or you can claim other dependents on your tax return. Your earned income must be below a certain limit to claim these credits.

Children and dependents must meet U.S. citizenship rules. Children must also have social security numbers. Other dependents must have social security numbers or individual taxpayer identification numbers (ITINs). A tax expert can help determine if you may claim these credits.

On average, it takes 21 days after filing to receive these credits.

documents.text: Social security number or individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)
Form W-2 for all household members in tax unit
1099 for all household members in tax unit
